name: The Mountaineers Books Backcountry Ski & Snowboard Routes Washington
description: Aimed at intermediate to expert backcountry skiers and snowboarders, this guidebook covers 80 routes throughout the state of Washington (and one in BC) including the Cascades, Olympics, and Mount Rainier. The range of routes include day trips suited for the less experienced, to challenging multi-day traverses. Every route includes the following features:  distance, time required, best season, fitness and skill level recommended, elevation, directions, maps, permits and details on the route.
